content: Would anyone know what this code system is for? http://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/UTG/CodeSystem-C5.html It doesnâ€™t look like an official FHIR R4 artifact, but can you offer any insight?
Looks like that's just a stub, holding a spot until it can be reviewed. You can safely ignore it for now
The question is being asked by the AMA who doesn't really want to ignore it... :)
The stub seems somewhat spurious - should it go away entirely?

@Monique van Berkum Like all questions on external code systems, please start with the HTA. You can use Zulip but HTA is responsible for the answer. To start the ball rolling I'll tag @Carol Macumber @Reuben Daniels.

Do you have any insight was to why there would have been a request to enter this OID into the HL7 OID registry?
@Robert McClure Thank you for starting things with the HTA. I do not know why there was a request to enter this in the HL7 OID registry.
